attributes.action: Calling on the government to waive visas for those coming to the UK from Ukraine
attributes.additional_details: Ukrainian people are showing unimaginable bravery in the face of Russian aggression. The UK had rightly led the world in supplying those fighting for Ukraine, but for those who can't fight, we must do more to offer routes out of Ukraine.
attributes.background: Waive visas for those coming to the UK from Ukraine.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Waive visa requirement for Ukrainian refugees: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609530

Offer fast track asylum to any Ukrainians displaced due to the invasion: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609382
